summary:
As i had promised, i did remake of my Unique Animated Crown to be possible to use it like common headdress.
Now wearing of the crown do not impose any restrictions to a player and you can use it with any stuff you like.
Despite that it had been needed to sacrifice many animation effects, but crown have become even better.
I didn\'t expect it cou
descriptionHtml:
[color=lightblue][b]Name:		Unique Animated Crown (Simplified)[/b][/color]
Date:		2013/07/11
Version:	1.00
Author:		Anton

[heading][color=yellow]Description:[/color][/heading]
This mod adds to the game new simplified unique animated crown.
Now crown has no restrictions and usability issues and can be used with anything.
To make this possible, it had been needed to sacrifice many animation effects. But crown still have amazing look and have become even better.
(i did not expect it can have such awesome look :) )

[heading][color=yellow]Demonstration video:[/color][/heading]
[youtube]WQichC5cL3o[/youtube]

[heading][color=yellow]How to get it:[/color][/heading]
You can create the crown in any forge if you have appropriate ingredients. (Topic: Jewelry)

[heading][color=yellow]Install:[/color][/heading]
Unpack mod to the game\'s \"\\Data\" folder.
Activate plugin in launcher \"Unique Animated Crown (Simplified).esp\"
(mod archive compatible with NNM and WrayBash installers)

[heading][color=yellow]Uninstall:[/color][/heading]
Remove folders:
- \"data\\meshes\\[Anton] mods\\Unique Crown\"
- \"data\\textures\\[Anton] mods\\Unique Crown\"
and file \"Unique Animated Crown (Simplified).esp\"

[heading][color=yellow]Uncompatibilities:[/color][/heading]
None at all !
(because this mod don\'t have any scripts and don\'t change any game data)

[heading][color=yellow]Credits:[/color][/heading]
Developers of Blender 2.65+
Developers of Paint.NET
NifTools team for Nifskope
Site \"render911.ru\" for free textures
Bethesda for the game and Creation Kit
to users, who helped me with suggestions when i was making this mod.
Me and my tools for newest Blender for the rest :)

[heading][color=yellow]Permissions:[/color][/heading]
Play with mod as you like, but don\'t change anything and don\'t upload it to another sites without my permission, please.

[heading][color=yellow]My other mods:[/color][/heading]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36414/?]Unique Animated Crown[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37710/?]SnowWhite Crown[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21453/?]Summon Animated Larvae[/url]
author: Anton

files.name: UniqueAnimatedCrown_simplified
files.changelogHtml: Changed receipt. Now males can forge this crown too.
